SEARCH
Package Util

Class GameMapLoader

java.lang.Object
Util.GameMapLoader
public class GameMapLoader extends Object
Game Map Loader Class This game maps are tile based every map is 32 by 18 tiles map object should be created with the appropriate screen size so that it can create the AABBs properly Class is little bit static in order to simply the loading process According to the type, AABBs are morphed according to the type statically.

  • Method Details

    • findTileLocation

      private Position2D<Float> findTileLocation(int gridX, int gridY)
      Find the position of the tile on the screen, Returns the "top left" corner of the tile. In java screen space coordinates starts from top left of the screen.
      Parameters:
      gridX - tile x coordinates
      gridY - tile y coordinates
      Returns:
      returns the tile position in screen space coordinates

    • devourFileToString

      private String devourFileToString(String filePath)
      Reads entire contents of the file to a string.
      Parameters:
      filePath - path of the file (directly fed to
      Returns:
      returns the enitre text file as a single string, returns null if file could not be opened

    • loadMap

      public boolean loadMap(String filePath)
      Loads the map to the internal data structures of the class, Creates AABBs for player, walls, power ups and enemies. Contents of the GameMapLoader is unspecified if load fails
      Parameters:
      filePath - path of the map file,
      Returns:
      returns true if map is loaded, false if not.
